title: A Gentle Introduction to Concept Drift in Machine Learning - Machine Learni
excerpt: Data can change over time. This can result in poor and degrading predictive performance in predictive models that assume a static relationship between input and output variables. This problem of the changing underlying relationships in the data is called concept drift in the field of machine learning. In this post, you will discover the problem of concept drift and waysâ€¦
